title: javascript - Validation for xxx-xxx-xxxx or (xxx)xxx-xxxx - Stack Overflow
text: Possible Duplicate: A comprehensive regex for phone number validation Whats the regex for xxx-xxx-xxxx or (xxx)xxx-xxxx I can create regex for the first one with /^\d{3}-\d{3}-\d{4}$/ but how to add rule in this so it can also handle the second one?
